documents.title: How to Set Up a New Source in Segment
documents.content: To set up a new source in Segment, go to the Segment dashboard, click 'Add Source', and follow the setup process...

documents.title: How to Create a User Profile in mParticle
documents.content: To create a user profile in mParticle, first, navigate to the 'Profiles' section, click 'Add Profile', and input user details...
